div.p: This code system http://ncpdp.org/reject-code defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: The National Council for Prescription Drug Programs, (NCPDP) Reject Code (511-FB) code set contains exception definitions for use when transaction processing cannot be completed.

copyright.value: These codes are copyrighted by National Council for Prescription Drugs Programs, Inc. (NCPDP), and are available by subscription.
